participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, but struggles with emotional connections.
participant_1.background: I just cooked my family some spaghetti. I dream of winning the lottery. My husband was a salesman. I love to watch my mother dance, so I put a ballerina mobile in my nursery to remind me of her. I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, with a humorous side.
participant_2.background: I enjoy spending time with my friends at my favorite coffee shop, where we can talk about our week and catch up. I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills. I once pretended to be a tour guide to escape a speeding ticket. My favorite store is American Eagle. My husband and I have a suicide pact.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Good, thanks for asking. I just got back from my favorite coffee shop.
That's awesome! I love coffee shops. I love spending time there with my friends.
Me too! My friends and I go there every week to talk about our week.
That's great. I'm a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close with my family and we try to spend time together as often as we can.
That's great. I wish I was closer to my family.
It's never too late to try to get closer to them.
I know, I know. I'll try.
Good! I'm sure they'd love to hear from you.
That's great! I'm sure they'll be happy to hear from you.
Me too. Thanks for talking to me.
No problem. I'm always happy to chat.
